enable_category_filter.description: Enable category filtering and show sale banner

show_sale_banner.description: Enable or disable the 30% sale banner

sale_banner_text.description: Text to display in the sale banner

sale_banner_discount.description: Discount percentage to display in the badge

sale_banner_background.description: Background color of the sale banner (hex code)

sale_banner_text_color.description: Text color of the sale banner (hex code)

version.description: Remote Config with sale banner and category filter
